kagalla-mawanalla margaye yathuru padiyaka gamangath tharunayan dedenaku thawath yathuru padiyak gatimen ek tharunayaku barapathala thuwala laba kagalla mulika rohalata athulath kara ehi dadi sathkara eekakaye prathikara labamin sitiya di miyagos athayi kagalla polis rathawahana eekakaya wisin jyeshta polis adhikari priyalal dasanayaka mahatha wetha wartha kara atha.mese miyagos aththe mawanalla kagalla margaye waragoda gammanayaka padinchiwa siti wayasa awurudu 25k pamana wana aar.pi.ee. susantha kumara namathi ayeki.siddhiya pilibandawa kagalla rohal polis eekakayeda sahaya matha kagalla polis rathawahana eekakaye po. ko. waldeniya (7986) mahatha wisin parikshanayak pawathwagena yanu labayi.kagalla hadisi marana parikshana eekakayedi rohal hadisi marana parikshakawaraya wisin siddhiya pilibandawa parikshanayak pawathwimata me wanawita piyawara gena kagalla rohal waidya eekakaye wisheshagnya adhikarana waidyawaraya wethin pashchath marana parikshana warthawakda laba gannata me wanawita piyawara ganimin sitithi.

niwaduwata thaththa gedara enathuru nonida para bala sitina chuti duwatayi puthatayi thaththa nawatha enne kawadada kiyala ahuwama mama monawa kiyannada?ampara mahaoya 69 kanuwa polis wishesha karya balaka kandawure pradhana polis parikshakawarayaku anapekshitha lesa thabana lada wedi paharakin jiwithakshayata pathwu aldeniya nangenahira kadawatha padinchi hathalis pas hawiridi sahakara polis adhikari muruththettu gamage sisira kumara muruththettugamage mahathage niwasata apa giya awasthawedi ee mahathage aadaraniya birinda wana yuniliwar aayathanaye widhayaka niladhariniyaka wana thispas hawiridi shehani nilupama perera mahathmiya hadisiye asimata siduwu samiya hadisiye wiyowu bawata salawu puwathin dadi lesa kampawata ha sanwegayata pathwa rogathurawa sitiyaya.ikuth sathi anthaye niwasata pamini siya aadaraniya piya thamanwa aadarayen wada karapita hiduwagena surathal kara nawatha enawita thaman illu sama deyama gena ena bawata poronduwi giya namuth ohuta siduwu me wipatha pilibandawa ho ohu nawatha thama surathal kirimata ho kelikawata bas dedimata ho noena bawa nodath kolambaa rajakiya widyalaye hathara wasare igenuma labana nawa hawiridi rawindra rashmika muruththettugamage puthath, dangakara surathal ladaru wiye sitina thehawiridi sanuli chuti diyaniyath mawage hadisi walapimata hethuwa soyamin mawa asala dawatemin siti.1966di rathnapurayedi upatha labu sisira kumara mahatha gahanu daruwan dedenek saha pirimi daruwan pasdenek sitina pawulaka dewani pirimi daruwa lesa melowa eliya daka atha.

ga්ramiya dhiwara sanwidhana wisin mehi di janadhipathiwaraya wetha wishesha sandeshayak da bhara dun athara jalashawalata awashya mathsya pataw bahalima wadi kirima, dhiwara aampanna laba ganima, jala jiwi wagawan sandaha rajaye idam laba ganima, jalashawala widhimath kalamanakaranaya sandaha niladharin yedawima, dhiwara karmanthaya sandaha awashya yatithala pahasukam saha mulya pa්rathipadana labadima athulu ema siyalu illim kadinamin itu kirimata piyawara ganna bawa pa්rakasha kala janadhipathiwaraya ema illim itu kirima athulu karmanthaye unnathiya wenuwen wadi mudalak mewara aya waya thulin wen kirimata katayuthu karana bawa sandahan kale ya.

owhu mosesta gaurawa kalak men joshuwata da ohuge mulu jiwitha kalayehi gaurawa dakwuwo ya. 15 ewita samindanan wahanse joshuwata katha kota, 16 ”giwisum karanduwa gena giya pujakawarunta jordan gangin nangi pitathata ena lesa kiyanna”yi wadala seka. 17 ebawin ohu pujakawarunta ana karamin, ”jordan gangin nangi pitathata enna”yi kiwe ya. 18 samindanan wahansege giwisum karanduwa gena giya pujakawarun jordan gangin godata awuth, thamange pada godabima thabu kenehi ma gange diya aapasu gala awith pera lesa gan iwuru thala gala giye ya. 19 melesa senanga palamu wana masaye dasa wana dina jordan gangin godata awuth, jerikowata nagenahira dishawehi gilgal nam sthanayehi kandawuru bandagaththo් ya. 20 owun jordan gangin gath ee gal dolosa joshuwa gilgalhi eka uda eka thaba 21 ishrayel janaya amathamin, ” ‘me gal piliwelata thaba thibenne kumata da’yi mathu kalayehi di obe daru parapura owunge piyawarungen asana wita 22 oba owunta pilithuru demin mese kiyanna, ‘ishrayelwaru wiyali bima dige me jordan gangen ethera wi aawo ya. 23 obe dewi samindanan wahanse apa rathu muhuden ethera wana thuru ehi diya, apa balagena sitiya di ma, hindawa damuwak men, un wahanse jordan gange diya da apa balagena sitiya di hindawa damu seka. 24 un wahanse ese kele, mihi pita siyallan samindanan wahansege hasthaya balawath bawa danaganu pinisath, owun dewi samindanan wahanseta sadahata ma garubiya dakwanu pinisath ya’ kiya danwiya yuthu ya”yi kiwe ya. 1 ishrayel janaya ethera wana thuru samindanan wahanse owun paminennata kalin jordan gange diya hindi yannata salasu bawa, jordan gangin ethera basnahira siti amoriwarunge siyalu rajawarun da madhyadharani muhudubada wisu kananiwarunge siyalu rajawarun da asu kala, owhu ishrayel janaya nisa thathi gena adhairyayata path wuha.

kisindu harayak nomathiwa hudekma thama patu paramarthayan itukara ganima wenuwen wiwidha yojana idiripath karana bawa penwadun niyojya amathiwaraya eewaye kisindu padanamak nomathi bawada shri lankawata erehiwa kisindu balapamak kala nohaki bawada penwa dunneya.dakunu aprikawe pawathi samuluwakadi podu rajya mandalaye shri lanka samajikathwaya athhitawiya yuthu bawata yojanawak idiripath kara thibena athara ee sandaha kandayam thunak yojana idiripathkara thibena bawada podu rajya mandaliya nithignyawarunge sangamaya, podu rajya mandaliya winisuruwarunge sangamaya saha podu rajya mandaliya nithi adhyapana sangamaya ee athara wana bawa wartha weyi.shri lankawa podu rajya mandalaye muladharmawalata patahaniwa katayuthu karana bawin samajikathwaya thahanam kala yuthu bawata mehidi yojanawak idiripathkara thibena athara eya podu rajya mandalaye amathiwarunge raswimedi salaka baliya yuthu bawada sandahankara atha.
nawaththa me lipiya gaththe wisthara on layin eken.
eeken therenne mulu aanduwakata parikshana karanna oonakama thiyeddi wijayadasa amathiwaraya thaniyenma eewa nawathwagena hitiya kiyana ekada?

dawasak loku ayiyage pawulamagen udawu deka thunak illuwa.maha lokuwata kayiya gahuwata maduru dalak ella gandawathba kiyalath kiyuwa.kadirchacha bidirchacha erwawa thunahatharak hadala dila.(loku ayiya badinda kalinnan gedara badu kadune na) antanawak hayikaranna ge watetama hayikarala thiyana punchi wahala kallakata naginda ona unath naginda bayayi kadawateyida kiyala.mageth ekka kathakarakara unnu loku ayiyage puththara rathnaya thaththage patirol karapu hati thamayime ''puthe mama naggoth wahalaya kadagana wateyida danna neda'' ''apo oka kadenna ape thaththa korchachara naginawada'' ''eya mokatada wahalayata naginne'' ''ayi patiwalata gihin bila gedara aawama armama dora arinnane thaththa wahaleta nagala mage kamaraye balkaniyen awith mata kathakarala dora arawagannawa'' ''ethakota nidaganne'' ''kamarayata giyoth armamata aharena nisa ma gawin hora wage nidiyanawa'' ''armama danne nadda oya dora arinawa kiyala'' ''issara danna dan dannawa aayeth mage balkaniye dora ariyothin mawath eliyata danawa kiyuwa.thaththa parwa mame.
eeth ma kalpana karanne liwimen mata ath wunu abhiwruddhiya nowa  wruddhiya kumak da kiya
thawath kalayak anith ayage adahas walatath ida dena gaman obeth wenas adahas nidahas sithuwili wala apita kiyawanna labewine neda...
eheth amarikawata sthira aagamak atha.
banku adhikshana departhamenthuwa shri lankawe banku aayathana akhandawa adhikshanaya ha niyamanaya kala yuthu we” yanna.
